## Bio

Hi there! I'm a global/joint PhD student at Maastricht University and KU Leuven. My research focuses on decision-making, reliability, mathematical or computational modeling, and intensive longitudinal data analysis. Beyond that, I am also an R lover, a lindy hopper, and a fire dancer.
